word_mean: 臭虫：臭虫科(Cimicidae)臭虫属(Cimex)的虫，包括温带臭虫(C.lectularius)和热带臭虫〔C.rotundatus (hemipterus)〕，为扁平卵圆形带红色昆虫，居屋内、家具及不卫生的床上，通常在夜间吸人血

sentence.Network_en: Good night, sleep tight, don't let the bedbug bite!

sentence.Network_en: The best bait for bedbug is to sleep three in a bed.
sentence.Network_cn: 臭虫的最佳食物,是三人同睡一床.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 臭虫(bedbug)俗称壁虱、木虱，嗜吸人血的臭虫有2种，即温带臭虫(Cimex lectularius)和热带臭虫(Cimex hemipterus)。　　[形态]  成虫 …
床虱（Bedbug）俗称臭虫，通常在夜间活动，爱好吸取人类血液。上世纪四十年代初期床虱在美国及多国蔓延，威力强大的DDT杀虫 …

entry.def: A bedbug is a small insect with a round body and no wings which lives in dirty houses and feeds by biting people and sucking their blood when they are in bed.

means.word_mean: 1. bug of temperate regions that infests especially beds and feeds on human blood
